WorkItem.ClosedComment: User Misconception, you can place wrong colors into sockets, it just doesn't give the socket bonus
WorkItem.Description:
I am currently using Rawr v2.2.24 and I noticed a bug for the "Available for Optimizer" function. It told me to put a red gem into the yellow slot of my "Furious Gladiator's Boots of Triumph" to improve my DPS. This is physically impossible game play wise. I have included a screen shot of the "optimizer recommendation".
Â 
~Fangz (Bloodguzzler, lv 80 Rogue, Nazgrel US)

Comments.Message:
How is it impossible?  
If you put a mis-matched gem in a piece of gear, it just doesn't activate the socket bonus.

The only gem that has a fixed location is the Meta Gems into Meta Sockets.  
The other limitation is no more than 3 dragon eyes equipped at any 1 time.  But otherwise, mix and match to your heart content.

Many tanks stack BLUE +STA gems on every socket they can get ahold of.
I've seen Rogues and Hunters stack +AGI.
